synopsis.text:
Will ing to leave behind his renowned business acumen in a virtual world, Yining embarks on an unexpected journey to the Wu Dynasty, aspiring to become a legendary martial artist. Adopting the name Ning Yi, he finds himself entangled in a complex web of power, politics, and commerce, unlike anything he had experienced before. As a new member of the Su family, he faces formidable enemies and becomes embroiled in significant legal battles.

In this alternate reality, the economy thrives on the emperor's benevolence, and Yining, now known as Ning Yi, must navigate these uncharted waters. His wife, Su Tanâ€™er, proves to be an even more dedicated worker than he is, adding another layer of complexity to his new life. With the Su family's future hanging in the balance, can Ning Yi reconcile his past and forge a successful path forward? Only time will tell if he can rise above the challenges and achieve his dreams.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
